faqs.q: Do I need to be an IT expert to attend?
faqs.a: Not at all! The event is designed for everyone ‚Äî whether you're a business owner, freelancer, manager, or just curious about cybersecurity. No technical background is required.

faqs.q: Will the content be too technical for me?
faqs.a: No. All sessions are built to be accessible and hands-on, using real-world examples that make sense no matter your level of experience. You‚Äôll learn practical steps you can apply immediately.

faqs.q: Who is this event really for?
faqs.a: It‚Äôs tailored for SMEs, self-employed professionals, and anyone looking to better understand how to protect their business or organization from cyber threats ‚Äî even if they‚Äôre not in IT.

faqs.q: What if I already have an IT provider or internal team?
faqs.a: Perfect ‚Äî this event will help you better understand the risks, ask the right questions, and make more informed decisions in collaboration with your IT support.

faqs.q: In which language the event will take place?
faqs.a: In Flanders in NL, in Wallonia in FR and in Brussels it will be bilingual. Some parts of the games may be in English but our coaches are there to help you.

faqs.q: Can I bring 2 colleagues with me to the event?
faqs.a: To give as many companies as possible a seat and to enrich the exchanges, we limit the participation to 2 persons for each company. So you can bring 1 colleague with you.

faqs.q: Can I have a certificate of attendance for the training?
faqs.a: All attendees will receive a certificate of attendance.

faqs.q: What if I can not attend due to illness or other urgent obligations?
faqs.a: We trust that by enrolling you are committed to attend and will not be absent unless an emergency should happen. To avoid 'no shows' and give the opportunity to other people to attend, we would really appreciate that you inform us as soon as possible. Finding a good stand-in from your company is then very welcome.

faqs.q: I have an allergy for nuts. Can you take this into account for the catering?
faqs.a: We will of course take into account all special dietary requirements, please let us know before the event.

faqs.q: We exchange a lot of sometimes confidential information, which makes the exercise so meaningful. However, can you ensure that all what is being discussed, exchanged and collected/processed is handled with the right level of confidentiality?
faqs.a: We refer to the link to our Privacy Policy at the bottom of the home page. Moreover, during the events we work with the Chatham House rule which means that you are free to use the information received but neither the identity nor the affiliation of the speaker(s), nor that of any other participant, may be revealed.
